de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.serverside

Class ClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.szut.dqi12.cheftrainer.connectorlib.serverside.ClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The ClientHandler class is the direct connection to the clients. The server class has a ClientHandler object for every open connection. This class creates the handshake with the client, stores the symmetric key for AES cipher and encrypts/decrypts the sent/received messages.
    Author:
    Alexander Brennecke

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Message message)
        Is used to send a message. The handshake must be completed otherwise there will nothing happen.
        Parameters:
        message - the decrypted message that should be send to the client

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the thread for the connection. Receives the messages, which were sent by the client.
